date-now

A requirable version of Date.now()

Use-case is to be able to mock out Date.now() using require interception.

Example

```js var now = require(“date-now”)

var ts = now() var ts2 = Date.now() assert.equal(ts, ts2) ```

example of seed

``` var now = require(“date-now/seed”)(timeStampFromServer)

// ts is in “sync” with the seed value from the server // useful if your users have their local time being a few minutes // out of your server time. var ts = now() ```

Installation

npm install date-now
